name: Lucas Almeida
description: Lucas is an expert in men’s and women’s haircuts, coloring, and hair treatments. He is particularly talented in modern styles and personalized cuts.

name: Sophia Martinez
description: Sophia specializes in makeup for all occasions, from everyday looks to bridal makeup. She is also skilled in updos and intricate hairstyles, especially for special events.

name: Sophie
description: Sophie is a creative artist who loves using fine brushes to create unique designs, such as flowers, cartoon characters, and geometric patterns.

name: Emma
description: Emma is known for her precision and perfectionism, creating fine, symmetrical lines for the classic French manicure or more modern, colorful versions.

name: Olivia
description: Olivia is a meticulous technician who loves creating long-lasting and durable nails with a glossy finish.

name: Ava
description: Ava uses eco-friendly and natural products, caring for both the health of the nails and the environment.

name: Isabella
description: Isabella loves creating glamorous and festive looks, such as nails adorned with rhinestones, glitter, and other eye-catching accessories.

name: Mia
description: Mia is efficient and focuses on clients who need a quick service without compromising on quality.

name: Charlotte
description: Charlotte combines relaxing treatments with manicures, like exfoliation, hydration, and massage.
category: Spa treatments for hands and feet.
